00045     SendHandleAlias::SendHandleAlias(const std::string& name,
00046                                      DataSourceBase::shared_ptr d,
00047                                      OperationInterfacePart* opf) :
00048         base::AttributeBase(name), data(d), fact(opf)

00050     }

00052     base::DataSourceBase::shared_ptr SendHandleAlias::getDataSource() const
00053     {

00055     }
00056

00058     {
00059         return fact;
00060     }
00061 
00062     SendHandleAlias* SendHandleAlias::clone() const

00065     }

00067             const base::DataSourceBase*, base::DataSourceBase*>& replacements,
00068                                            bool)
00069     {
00070         // instantiate does not apply.
